#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef pair<int,int> pii;
int cnt,vis[20][20];
int n,a[20][20];
void dfs(int i,int j){
     if(i==n-1&&j==n-1)cnt++;
     vis[i][j]=1;
     if(i>0&&!a[i-1][j]&&!vis[i-1][j])dfs(i-1,j);
     if(i<n-1&&!a[i+1][j]&&!vis[i+1][j])dfs(i+1,j);
     if(j>0&&!a[i][j-1]&&!vis[i][j-1])dfs(i,j-1);
     if(j<n-1&&!a[i][j+1]&&!vis[i][j+1])dfs(i,j+1);
     vis[i][j]=0;
}
int main(){
    //freopen("in","r",stdin);

    cin>>n;
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)for(int j=0;j<n;j++)cin>>a[i][j];
    dfs(0,0);
    cout<<cnt<<endl;
    return 0;
}
